DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information relating to the type of severity associated with an infection.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared._A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact._Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A starting point to which things may be compared.:A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.

Concepts.definition: A starting point to which things may be compared.
A disorder resulting from the presence and activity of a microbial, viral, fungal, or parasitic agent. It can be transmitted by direct or indirect contact.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.

Concepts.definition: Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The type of severity associated with an infection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Life Threatening or Disabling Adverse Event

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Life Threatening or Disabling Adverse Event
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Any adverse event that places the patient, in the view of the initial reporter, at immediate risk of death from the adverse event as it occurred, i.e., it does not include an adverse experience that, had it occurred in a more severe form, might have caused death.

Concepts.longName: Life Threatening or Disabling Adverse Event
Concepts.definition: Any adverse event that places the patient, in the view of the initial reporter, at immediate risk of death from the adverse event as it occurred, i.e., it does not include an adverse experience that, had it occurred in a more severe form, might have caused death.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An experience that is usually transient, and requires no special treatment or intervention. The event does not generally interfere with usual daily activities. Includes transient laboratory test alterations.

Concepts.definition: An experience that is usually transient, and requires no special treatment or intervention. The event does not generally interfere with usual daily activities. Includes transient laboratory test alterations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An experience that is alleviated with simple therapeutic treatments. The event impacts usual daily activities. Includes laboratory test alterations indicating injury, but without long-term risk.

Concepts.definition: An experience that is alleviated with simple therapeutic treatments. The event impacts usual daily activities. Includes laboratory test alterations indicating injury, but without long-term risk.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 8/12/22 added alt VM for Alliance cjl;

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Severe adverse event is an experience that requires therapeutic intervention. The event interrupts usual daily activities. If hospitalization is required for treatment it becomes a serious adverse event.

Concepts.definition: An adverse event experience that requires intensive therapeutic intervention and interrupts usual daily activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition:
any unfavorable symptoms, signs, or disease temporally associated with the use of a medical
treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical
treatment or procedure.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

Concepts.definition: The invasion of an organism's body tissues by disease-causing agents and their multiplication, as well as the reaction by the host to these organisms and/or toxins that the organisms produce.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
